name: Faerie's Strike
text: Ephemeral wisps of nature spirits dance about those you strike.
prerequisites: Nature Magic or the ability to cast druid or ranger spells; Vital Strike, Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks.
benefit: When you use Vital Strike (or Improved Vital Strike or Greater Vital Strike), the creature you hit with the attack must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Wisdom modifier) or be illuminated as if by faerie fire for 1 minute. You can use this benefit a number of times per day equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to increase the DC of the effect by an amount equal to the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 第一世界的能量在你的武器间流动，飞舞的火花纠缠在它们击中的目标身周。
prerequisites_zh: 自然魔法（Nature Magic）专长或可以施放游侠或德鲁伊法术；暴击，知识（自然）技能5级。
benefit_zh: 每当你发动一次暴击（或是精通暴击和高等暴击）攻击时，被你击中的生物必须通过一个意志检定（DC=10+你角色等级的一半+你的感知调整值）否则受到相当于法术妖火术（Faerie Fire）的影响，持续1分钟。你每日可以使用本能力的次数等同于你的感知调整值。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你能消耗至多5点耐力来将这个效果的DC提升你所消耗的耐力值。
